defs: a low, continuous, murmuring sound of or like that of a bee; a humming sound.
the state or fact of keeping silent; a refraining from speech or from making noise; silence.
a kind of small insect, esp. dipterous fly, that flies around human eyes and abound in mango season; an eye-fly.
(fig.) an insignificant thing, animal or person.
the joint that connects the foot and the leg; the ankle.
a man who has achieved ಘುಟಿಕಾಸಿದ್ಧಿ (see below).
a kind of superhuman power achieved by yogis (as keeping a mystical pill in the mouth, entering into the body of a dead and vitalising it, etc.).
a small globular or rounded mass of medicinal substance, that is to be swallowed whole; a pill.
the bellowing sound of a bull.
a sound imitating it.
the cooing sound of a pigeon.

with a deep, rumbling sound.

any of a family Bostrychiadae (order Coleopotera) of insects, that eat away or pulverises the wood and wood articles and renders them strengthless; powder post beetle.

a milky-white, translucent feldspar with a pearly lustre, used as a gem (supposed to be formed from the congelation of the mooṇs rays and to dissolve under the influence of its light); the moonstone.
to make something become or look ugly; to mar or spoil the beauty of.
to lose one's natural form, shape or beauty; to become ugly.
an ugly-looking person.
a person who disfigures, deforms a beautiful thing.
the quality, tendency of a person who habitually disfigures, deforms beautiful things.

a kind of unctuous perfume made by grinding the sandalwood on a stone.
powdered sandalwood.
the act of applying the sandal paste on ( the body of).
